name: The Stockpile
description:
Preparing to move in with your new roommate, you have just a few last things before you can clear out the storage place you rented. While grabbing the last boxes, strange noises leave you wondering: is someone else with you?

Controls:

WASD to Move

Mouse to Look

Left Click to Interact

Right Click to Zoom

Space to Jump

Left Control to Crouch

Escape to Quit

A game by Brianna Baggott

Developed by Pizza Party 2023

If you enjoyed the game please give a rating!
